page.title: 07FAIRFORDIANS AT LEISURE
page.content: Cultural, sportive and leisure pursuits are well provided for in Fairford. {Fairford Amateur Dramatic {Society} regularly produces plays, revues and pantomimes and{Fairford {Choral Society}stage periodic concerts of both religious and secular music. Drama and music combine to produce in the church musical dramas, for example in Oct. l985, 'Jesus Christ Super Star'. An enthusiastic Art Society meets frequently and has an annual exhibition of the work of its members. The more active sportsmen find an outlet at football, cricket, bowls and tennis. The youth are catered for at Community Centre meetings. Field sports vary with the season -fishing in summer, pheasant shoots and fox hunting in winter. The Cotswold Oil Engine Preservation Society display their engines at public functions.
